thread.title: Planners to benefit from Harbour Grand Kowloon's anniversary perks
thread.title_full: Planners to benefit from Harbour Grand Kowloon's anniversary perks

author: Hong Kong, July 16, 2015
title: Planners to benefit from Harbour Grand Kowloon's anniversary perks
text:
Planners to benefit from Harbour Grand Kowloon's anniversary perks Hong Kong, July 16, 2015 
IN CELEBRATION of its 20 th anniversary, Harbour Grand Kowloon has rolled out a series of promotions including a meeting offer. 
Priced from HK$480 (US$62) per person, the Anniversaryâ€™s Special Meeting Package allows planners to add on a perk for only HK$20. Options include themed refreshments per break, soft drinks and chilled orange juice served throughout lunch, a Chinese/Japanese/executive western set lunch, or an hour-long cocktail reception for up to 200 pax with free-flow beverages before dinner. 
Offer ends July 31, 2015.
